name: Space Yandere (itch)
description:
Space Yandere is a cute, dramatic story experience. Play as a robot, made by the love-crazy Luna, en route to a paradise planet.

The game features beautiful art, loveable characters, and compelling music.

While containing elements of horror, the game is cute at its core.

A single playthrough may take around 45 minutes.

Bad End: "Corrupt"

Neutral End: "Escaped"

Good End: "Verdant Green"

Bonus Epilogue: "Perfect Blue"

Comes with the full original soundtrack!
